nodes.text: This Umbaran lived on the planet of Umbara around 21 BBY during the events of the Clone Wars and was part of the Umbaran militia.
During the Battle of Umbara, this Umbaran along with many other members of the militia fough the Galactic Republic clone trooper forces sent to retake the planet.

After the clone troopers won the initial assault and drove back the Umbaran militia, they set up an encampment on the nearby ridge to rest. However, several Umbaran militia members managed to sneak behind them, including this one which released a Millicreep assassin droid that started attacking and killing the clone troopers. Shortly after, the Umbarans opened fire, but all of them were eventually killed after Jedi Master Pong Krell called in an airstrike on the ridge.
